jyzer.items.attributes
Class Attributes

java.lang.Object
  jyzer.items.attributes.Attributes

public class Attributes
extends java.lang.Object

A class representing a set of atrributes. Used in several ways, like classes, methods, ... can have attributes.

Version:
1.0, 2005. nov. 12.
Author:
Legendi Richard Oliver

Constructor Detail

Attributes

public Attributes(java.io.DataInput di)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  CorruptedClassfileException
This constructor reads the needed information from the given input, and creates the object.

Parameters:
di - an opened input (should be a DataInputStream, but can be exchanged with any subclass).
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
CorruptedClassfileException - if the classfile seems to be corrupted.

getPureExceptionNames

public java.lang.String[] getPureExceptionNames(java.lang.String enclosingClassName)
Returns the name of the exceptions from the ExceptionsAttribute as an array of strings; returns null if there's no ExceptionsAttribute.

Parameters:
enclosingClassName - the name of the enclosing class.

getHTMLDescription

public void getHTMLDescription(java.lang.StringBuilder sb)
Concatenates a HTML string that represents this class ( looks cool! ) to the end of the given StringBiulder object. Using this method for improve efficiency, cause I had a lot of problems with displaying such a long HTML text in an EditorPane.

Parameters:
sb - a StringBuilder that contains the string representation of the full classfile.

For debugging reasons. I was intrested to overwrite this method.
